content.text:
# Schwarzkopf (Spessart)

| type =
| first_ascent =
| easiest_route =
}}
Schwarzkopf is a wooded hill located in the Aschaffenburg district of Bavaria, Germany. It is part of the Mittelgebirge Spessart. Schwarzkopf lies east of Laufach and south of Heigenbr√ºcken. It is located in the unincorporated area Forst Hain im Spessart.
The long-distance hiking path Eselsweg passes over the hill. Schwarzkopf is also close to the Spessart Ramp of the Main-Spessart railway (Schwarzkopftunnel).
